EmailTemplate.name: 11-24-21 BNK PFDFW Phase 2B Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New eBook: The 3 Key Disruptions Impacting Transaction Processing
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Payments are changing like never before. Digital wallets and bank transfers combined could account for over 60% of all transactions by 2021. You need to be agile—so your financial institution can keep up. Whether it’s technology or processes, being able to transform is vital in today’s evolving payments market. Explore our latest eBook and see the three disruptive payments trends that you need to be ready for. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
